headline: Expand Energy Corporation Announces Expiration and Results of Tender Offer for 5.500% Senior Notes due 2026
summary: OKLAHOMA CITY, Nov. 27, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Expand Energy Corporation (NASDAQ: EXE) (“Expand Energy”) announced today the expiration and results of its previously announced offer to purchase for cash (the “Tender Offer”) any and all of its outstanding 5.500% Senior Notes due 2026 (the “Notes”), which expired at 5:00 p.m., New York City time, on November 27, 2024 (the “Expiration Time”). As of the Expiration Time, $453,162,000 aggregate principal amount of Notes, or approximately 90.63% of t

headline: Expand Energy Corporation Announces Pricing Terms of Cash Tender Offer for its 5.500% Senior Notes due 2026
summary: OKLAHOMA CITY, Nov. 27, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Expand Energy Corporation (NASDAQ: EXE) (“Expand Energy”) announced today the pricing terms of the previously announced cash tender offer to purchase (the “Tender Offer”) any and all of its outstanding 5.500% Senior Notes due 2026 (the “Notes”).
